languages.text: "Шевелитесь, крысы пустотные, за что я вам плачу? Это абордаж, а не отпуск на Футфоле!"

traits.locale_text: Барк от Капитана, стадия абордажа 2, барк 1.

languages.text: "Отбивайте мой корабль, паразиты подпалубные, или я проветрю пару отсеков с вами!"
"Take back my ship, you gutter vermin, before I decide to vent a few compartments and you along with them!"
languages.original_text: "Отбивайте мой корабль, паразиты подпалубные, или я проветрю пару отсеков с вами!"

traits.locale_text: "Take back my ship, you gutter vermin, before I vent a few compartments and you alongside them!"
"Take back my ship, you gutter vermin, before I vent a few compartments and you alongside them!"
"Take back my ship, you gutter vermin, before I decide to vent a few compartments and you along with them!"
"Take back my ship, you gutter vermin, before I decide to vent a few compartments and you along with them!"
"Take back my ship, you gutter vermin, before I decide to vent a few compartments and you along with them!"
"Take back my ship, you gutter vermin, before I decide to vent a few compartments and you along with them!"

languages.text: "Erobert mein Schiff zurück, ihr Schaben, bevor ich ein paar Module belüften lasse ... und euch gleich mit!"
languages.original_text: "Take back my ship, you gutter vermin, before I decide to vent a few compartments and you along with them!"

traits.locale_text: "Erobert mein Schiff zurück, ihr Schaben, bevor ich ein paar Module belüften lasse ... und euch gleich mit!"

languages.text: « Reprenez mon vaisseau, misérables vermines, avant que je ne décide de décompresser quelques compartiments avec vous à l'intérieur ! »
languages.original_text: "Take back my ship, you gutter vermin, before I decide to vent a few compartments and you along with them!"

traits.locale_text: « Reprenez mon vaisseau, misérables vermines, avant que je ne décide de décompresser quelques compartiments avec vous à l'intérieur ! »

languages.text: «¡Recuperad el control de mi nave, alimañas sarnosas, o me pongo a abrir esclusas y os expulso al vacío con todo lo que haya dentro!».
languages.original_text: "Take back my ship, you gutter vermin, before I decide to vent a few compartments and you along with them!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Recuperad el control de mi nave, alimañas sarnosas, o me pongo a abrir esclusas y os expulso al vacío con todo lo que haya dentro!».

languages.text: “你们这群臭虫，赶紧把我的船抢回来，否则我就把几个舱室的气闸打开，把你们统统扔进去！”
languages.original_text: "Take back my ship, you gutter vermin, before I decide to vent a few compartments and you along with them!"

traits.locale_text: “你们这群臭虫，赶紧把我的船抢回来，否则我就把几个舱室的气闸打开，把你们统统扔进去！”

languages.text: 「このクズどもめ、私の船を取り戻せ！さもないと船内区画ごと貴様らを真空に放り出してやるぞ！」
languages.original_text: "Take back my ship, you gutter vermin, before I decide to vent a few compartments and you along with them!"

traits.locale_text: 「このクズどもめ、私の船を取り戻せ！さもないと船内区画ごと貴様らを真空に放り出してやるぞ！」

languages.text: "Gemimi geri alın pis haşereler! Yoksa havalandırırım kompartımanları, uçup bu şerefsizlere eşlik edersiniz!"
languages.original_text: "Take back my ship, you gutter vermin, before I decide to vent a few compartments and you along with them!"

traits.locale_text: "Gemimi geri alın pis haşereler! Yoksa havalandırırım kompartımanları, uçup bu şerefsizlere eşlik edersiniz!"
